## SimpleUserDelegate.onServerDisconnect() method

Called when user is no longer connected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onServerDisconnect?(error?: Error): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | <code>Error</code> | An Error if server caused the disconnect. Otherwise undefined. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

Callback for handling user becomes disconnected.
